Title: Relates to amending the constitution to prohibit an immediate vote to be called on budget bills
Summary: Amends the constitution to prohibit an immediate vote from being called by the governor or acting governor on any budget bills.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 14 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to prohibiting the governor from issuing a message of necessity for budget related bills
